entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
